mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Notes on a letter from Charles Calonnes on trade articles and issues heretofore undiscussed by French and American emissaries; covers topics including the most fair criteria by which to levy import duties on American vessels, and the amounts to be levied on fish oils, rice, potash, and naval stores.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States--Foreign economic relations
mdRecord.dcterms:title: "Observations on the letter of Monsieur [Charles Alexandre] de Calonnes to Monsieur Jefferson," 1786 October 22, n.p.
